{{Lang|'''Tominaga Masanari'''|ja=富永正也|ja_rm=Tominaga Masanari}} was a historical figure in [[Inazuma]].

==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->
Tominaga Masanari was the third-generation heir of the [[Souran Isshin Art]]. He was able to befriend the youkai [[Kamai Kenji]], and five hundred years ago, they fought side-by-side until their final moments. The blade he used was from the founder of the Souran Isshin Art and Kamai's best friend, [[Yanagibashi Takuto]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Currents of Life}}</ref>
